TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Kerbalized Flags, Agencies, and Decal Textures [03Aug21] - And Suits [v1.0 - 15Sep21 - More Slim Suits].

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, DirtyFace83 said:
> 
> 
> [![Py6qRVZ.png](https://i.imgur.com/Py6qRVZ.png)](https://i.imgur.com/Py6qRVZ.png "Enlarge image")
> 

NOICE!!!

So I've finally had enough of Lo-Res, Lo-Kuality flag textures. I'm currently in the process of converting all the Flag, Agency Decal, and Mission Patch textures to slightly higher resolution and also switching to use .dds from .png.

The Long and Shuttle Decals I will hold off on, but they will probably eventually get some love.

When I first uploaded this 5 years ago, I was maybe a little bit lazier than I am now. So hopefully, some things will get a little design improvement as part of the process.

I won't be adding anything else until this is done, but if @davidy12 or anyone else has any ideas/requests for country flags, agencies, crewed mission patch sets (STS is already in my mind to do), or anything else that is screaming to be Kerbalized **within the very obvious scope of this pack**, I'm happy to look into those ideas.

Here is a non-final sketch of the Koviet Flag:

Spoiler

![ZYgTYy3.png](https://i.imgur.com/ZYgTYy3.png)

im asking how to use it i dont know how to select it

If everything is installed correctly, from inside the game, you see should the decal parts in the 'Structural' parts category in the Assembly Building. Then to change which image displays, right click the part and there are buttons to switch textures.

You could try delete and re-extract the files? It's possible something went wrong.

> Do they work on stock KSP 1.10?
> 

They currently require one (or both) of the two mods listed in the <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr>.  I've been busy making the textures look nicer at higher scales, but I do intend to make them work with stock, yes.

> 
> 
> 17 hours ago, Quoniam Kerman said:
> 
> 
> Do they work on stock KSP 1.10?
> 

I wanted to clarify that the flags work just fine with 1.10 stock, and most of the Agency decals will show up, but unitl I mess around with the long decals, those, and the mission patches will have to wait. In the meantime, a workaround if you wanted to use the mission patches would be to copy those from 'KerbalizedDecals/Textures/MissionPatches' into 'KerbalizedFlagpack/Flags' and they will then show up. As I mentioned before, I'm currently upgrading the texture resolution on a lot of things, so there may be pixelization on the bigger scale decals.

The long decals are just the wrong ratio for them to work with stock at the minute.

**Edited <time datetime="2020-07-03T09:47:54Z" title="07/03/2020 09:47  AM" data-short="4 yr">July 3, 2020</time> by DirtyFace83**

Some new things:

After reading Margo Kerman's blog post in her new job, this had to be included:

![3eF39W5.png](https://i.imgur.com/3eF39W5.png)

Which then logically led to this:

![UcbGj1a.png](https://i.imgur.com/UcbGj1a.png)

Which made this necessary:

![6JbD8d9.png](https://i.imgur.com/6JbD8d9.png)

And then while looking for those, this Swedish agency had to go in:

![FZSWzAN.png](https://i.imgur.com/FZSWzAN.png)

And finally, the Indonesian agency LAPAN has changed its logo to a better one it seems, so that had to change:

![yDuVA3r.png](https://i.imgur.com/yDuVA3r.png)

There are lond decal textures to go with each (and a couple more that didn't have one have been added, along with a texture resolution update for the agency decals.
